job_description: TAIGER seeks Software Engineers to join our engineering team and help us design and implement highly performing software. Successful candidates have a proven track record developing software for the Web and hold a BsC, MsC or PhD in computer science, engineering or related field. As a Software Engineer in Taiger you will contribute to the development of innovative products, based on state-of-the-art technologies, and able to make a significant impact in the industry. You should be genuinely excited by an unstructured, fast-moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you.  RESPONSIBILITIES  Build and deliver software products and solutions based on state-of-the-art AI technology. Own and support the software development life cycle including application development, implementation and maintenance. Design efficient, maintainable, reliable software design and coding. Manage unit and integration software testing and assist Quality Assurance team providing the guidelines to perform functional testing. Perform installation, configuration and customisation of software products delivered to clients. Work in in autonomous, cross-functional Squads, taking ownership of development activities and sharing knowledge across peers.
job_company_info:
Whilst we waited for flying cars, the 4th industrial revolution began. This will fundamentally change the nature of work at every company. Taiger is leading this transformation and clients that work with us are at the frontier. We deliver revolutionary results by helping clients replace ‘knowledge workers’ with a more reliable, Artificial Intelligence powered virtual workforce within all of their processes. 
Taiger is a global leader in cognitive automation for financial enterprises and other organisations, present on four continents. We build digital machines that are faster, better and cheaper than humans in certain work functions, or make humans vastly more productive in others. These are big, difficult problems which require equally audacious technical solutions. 
Traditional structured data is only a fraction of an organisation’s information; the vast majority of information is unstructured content: documents, reports, emails, survey forms, voice calls etc. Traditional machine learning approaches alone cannot solve for unstructured information. This requires something much more special.
Taiger fundamentally solves unstructured information access problems and transforms mere information into executable knowledge. Our product portfolio is based on a state-of-the-art AI solution architecture for reuse and agile integration.
Taiger has a deep expertise in combining 5 of the 7 forms of AI to help make financial institutions profitable again. This is technically achieved through the application of semantic and natural language processing (NLP) techniques, knowledge representation, perception and concept-extraction and multi-language ontology building skills, which no other product provider offers.
We undertake cutting edge research and apply the latest technical innovations to solve real problems. 
You should genuinely be excited by an unstructured, fast moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you.
job_requirement: SKILLS REQUIRED  Fresh graduate or 1+ years of experience in software development with Bachelor's Degree in BSc or MSc in computer science, engineering or a related technical discipline (or equivalent). Experience in Java, Spring Framework. Solid knowledge of Object Oriented Programming and Design Patterns. Knowledge of Relational Databases. Knowledge of Windows and Unix operating systems. Familiarity with Agile methodologies. Good written and oral communication skills in English. Ability to effectively communicate within the team, as well as with clients.  PREFFERED  Knowledge of Frontend development - Javascript, HTML, CSS. Good understanding of security, performance, scalability aspects. Knowledge on software lifecycle management and code organisation. Proactivity in suggesting solutions and improvements. Familiarity or interest in AI, Semantic Technologies, NLP and Search Engines.  Link to this job: https://taiger.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=94

Our focus is in Insurtech and Fintech but beyond this, we always seek opportunities where technology is key.    You will be one of the key contributors in our development organization and will develop high-quality software solutions across multiple domains and technologies applying an agile and lean approach. You will be required to collaborate with the wider team and contribute to innovative technical solutions to meet customer requirements. You will translate these solutions into high-quality code, in accordance with appropriate standards and best practices. You will coach others in producing high-quality code and perform peer review to ensure code quality and conformance to requirements. At Uncharted Partners, we aim to exceed customer expectation by fostering innovation and quality and being outcome-oriented at speed. Our means to success are talent and stewardship. We value open and honest communication. We respect others and have integrity in our profession.  We also value diversity and always treat all employees and job applicants based on merit, qualifications, competence and talent. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.
job_company_info:
Empowering business with next generation technology.
Uncharted Partners enables the journey towards a digital transformation, helping good companies become great. We believe a competitive advantage combines modern methodologies with technologies that deliver tangible business value.
job_requirement: You have extensive experience in software development, working autonomously on a broad range of projects and technologies. Background in the insurance domain, or in product development, is an advantage but not a must. You love to code and spend a majority of your working days hands-on in code, seeking to grow your technical expertise both within and outside the working environment, taking every opportunity to learn about technical things that trigger your curiosity. You are action-focused and outcome-driven and strive to deliver maximum value with minimum effort.  Our teams implement features with end-to-end ownership and while we appreciate your expertise lies in a specific area, this requires proficiency in both backend and frontend technologies. You consider yourself a full stack developer comfortable with designing solutions in both backend and frontend. You are proficient in Java and have extensive experience working in web application frameworks based on Java such as Spring Boot, Grails etc.  You are confident in designing and implementing backend REST APIs serving frontend clients and other systems. You have experience with different types of database technologies such as MySQL and MongoDB. You have experience in developing solutions with rich frontend mobile and desktop SPA web apps using modern JS frameworks such as Vue.js, React etc. You love to work in a team taking ownership of application development end to end, from source code to deployment using build tools and delivery pipelines in cloud infrastructure. You have experience with containerised deployment solutions such as Kubernetes, Docker Swarm etc. You have experience working in projects conforming to high security standards. Experience in implementing continuous delivery pipeline using build tools like Travis or Jenkins is beneficial. You have a comprehensive understanding of agile methodology, you apply an incremental development approach where you seek to validate the product and collect valuable feedback from users or clients with the least amount of effort. You are comfortable working in an agile environment following the SCRUM framework and strive to enhance the practices of the team. You take ownership of delivering outcome while actively seeking to work and collaborate with people, constantly seeking to learn from, and share your expertise with others.

job_description: TAIGER seeks Senior Front End Engineers to join our engineering team and help us design and implement highly performing software. Successful candidates have a proven track record developing software for the Web and hold a BsC, MsC or PhD in computer science, engineering or related field. As a Senior Front End Engineer in TAIGER you will contribute to the development of innovative products, based on state-of-the-art technologies, and make a significant impact in optimising . You should genuinely be excited by an unstructured, fast-moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you. RESPONSIBILITIES  Use industry web standards to build solutions using semantic markup, templates (Handlebars) and SASS Apply strong understanding of all major browsers and special considerations required catering to each browser to create consistent project outcomes Competency in JavaScript programming without reliance on libraries to accomplish innovative interactions Dynamically create, modify and style page elements with ease and awareness of interplay between JavaScript and HTML & CSS Design frameworks for user apps creations in line with growing needs of the company Assist in the development of applications and features for client project delivery and internal functions Work comfortably with source version control software and package managers, and build-tools (Git, NPM, Gulp, Grunt, Webpack) Develop front-end pages demonstrating expertise in fundamental visual and interactive design disciplines
job_company_info:
Whilst we waited for flying cars, the 4th industrial revolution began. This will fundamentally change the nature of work at every company. Taiger is leading this transformation and clients that work with us are at the frontier. We deliver revolutionary results by helping clients replace ‘knowledge workers’ with a more reliable, Artificial Intelligence powered virtual workforce within all of their processes. 
Taiger is a global leader in cognitive automation for financial enterprises and other organisations, present on four continents. We build digital machines that are faster, better and cheaper than humans in certain work functions, or make humans vastly more productive in others. These are big, difficult problems which require equally audacious technical solutions. 
Traditional structured data is only a fraction of an organisation’s information; the vast majority of information is unstructured content: documents, reports, emails, survey forms, voice calls etc. Traditional machine learning approaches alone cannot solve for unstructured information. This requires something much more special.
Taiger fundamentally solves unstructured information access problems and transforms mere information into executable knowledge. Our product portfolio is based on a state-of-the-art AI solution architecture for reuse and agile integration.
Taiger has a deep expertise in combining 5 of the 7 forms of AI to help make financial institutions profitable again. This is technically achieved through the application of semantic and natural language processing (NLP) techniques, knowledge representation, perception and concept-extraction and multi-language ontology building skills, which no other product provider offers.
We undertake cutting edge research and apply the latest technical innovations to solve real problems. 
You should genuinely be excited by an unstructured, fast moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you.
job_requirement: REQUIREMENTS  5+ years of experience in professional software development experience with front end web development (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, AJAX) Proficiency in AngularJS 1.x Strong understanding and experience in designing and utilising RESTful APIs to build Single Page Applications Experience building user interfaces following component architecture BSc or MSc in computer science, engineering or a related technical discipline (or equivalent), preferred. Strong knowledge of web development tools and programming languages Proactivity in suggesting solutions and improvements.  PREFERRED  Familiarity or interest in AI, Semantic Technologies, NLP and Search Engines. Experience in building hybrid mobile apps using the Ionic Framework / Cordova Experience in building web applications with ECMAScript 6+ Experience in any of the following - Vue.js, Angular, or React Experience in working with backend built in Java EE and Spring Framework Understanding of security, performance, scalability aspects in web application development Working knowledge on software lifecycle management and code organization.

job_description: Analyze business and IT challenges and design a comprehensive solution that integrates smoothly   Design for reliability, availability, and scalability  Work with other Architects to ensure enterprise and cross-program architectural cohesion Review of all technical deliverables and to maintain high quality of deliverables
job_company_info: About Emerio Emerio, an NTT communication company, is a leading IT solutions and services organization with deep roots in South East Asia. We provide a suite of solutions and a large stack of IT services to our clients in the Banking and Financial Services, Education, Government, Healthcare, Hospitality, and Social Services domains. With over 2,200 employees we have been providing comprehensive ICT solutions, provisioning and management of IT infrastructure and business applications, data analytics, data visualisation and IT professional services for the past 18 years. Our brand values are REAL. Reliability, Efficiency and Adaptability is the basis of Long-term relationships with our clients.
job_requirement: Minimum 5 years of experience in Hybris platform. Should have hands on knowledge in Hybris 1808+ version.  Good Experience in Support role in Hybris.  Strong experience with high volume B2B eCommerce systems  Ability to prioritize and manage work to critical task timelines in a fast-paced environment   Ability to share and communicate ideas both verbally and in writing to executive staff, business sponsors and technical resources, in clear concise language that is the parlance of each group.  Excellent oral and written communication skills  Experience with agile software development techniques

job_description: Participate in a technical team in all technical aspects from analysis, design, development/coding debug, libraries, 3rd party products evaluation. Understand user interface navigation workflows to simulate user experience as part of requirements analysis and prototyping Enhance technical capability of the technical team by applying thinking skills in technical aspects. Translate customer/product requirements into technical requirements. Involved in product, technical requirements and design specs documents. Strong communication skills in English. Experience working with, and managing, geographically spread teams across different time zones is a plus
job_company_info: Quantum Inventions (QI) is in the business of providing mobility intelligence to consumer, corporations & governments leveraging on our integrated suite of mobility applications, enterprise logistics & analytics platforms QI sells products and solutions, today, in Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Phillipines and Sri Lanka.  QI will be expanding into Vietnam and India shortly. In Singapore, QI sells navigation software under the Galactio brand, tracking under the SGTrack brand.  In a short time span, from its incorporation in 2006, QI has grown to be a formidable company in ITS solutions, dynamic traffic information services and connected navigation.  QI has won numerous awards: Young Innovator Award under the Land Transport Excellence Awards in 2010 (by the Ministry of Transport of Singapore), and Red Herring Top 100 Asia awards in 2011.  QI’s clients include blue-chip companies such as: Singapore Telecom, Land Transport Authority of Singapore, Vodafone (Middle East), Aapico Hitech (Thailand), Toyota Tsusho, Google, Ministry of Defense (Singapore), Port of Singapore Authority (PSA).  QI has grown over 80% CAGR in the last two years and is growing leaps and bounds in SE Asia – Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, & Philippines.
job_requirement: 3+ years of relevant working experience in software development Solid foundation in computer science, data structures and algorithms Strong programming logic and quick mind to understand the requirements of software application development. Strong knowledge of Java programming languages Knowledge in Microservices Architecture Proven record in software development, testing and troubleshooting. Experience optimizing code for performance Proficient understanding of code versioning tools ( i.e git )    Good to have:  Knowledge of scripting languages Knowledge of relational database like MySQL, Orable, etc Knowledge of NoSQL like HBase, MongoDB etc

job_description: Taking complete ownership of the design, development, testing of innovative software with an emphasis on implementing high availability, scalable back-end platform. Producing efficient, maintainable, reliable code and unit testing. Delivering results that meet requirements specifications with a high level of quality and customer satisfaction. Analyzing and solving performance and security related requirements in the applications. Producing documentation and artifacts in accordance with the processes for collaborating with the business teams. Continuous support on application enhancement, updates, bug fixes for the operational systems. Continuous acquiring job knowledge by studying state-of-the-art development tools, programming techniques, and computing equipment. Working as an integral member of a project team, making important individual contributions.
job_company_info:
QRInno is a Competence and Engagement platform, AI Robot and “Digital Property Builder” for global business. QRInno works closely with various local or international innovation partners in contractual agreement to help individuals to bring their career goals to the next level with new challenging and rewarding opportunities. 
QRInno Development is digital property builder that leading Resource.AI technologies which bridging the gaps between video analytics, intelligent sensing, command center, workforce matching and deployment policy. The team Makes Robot Smarter !
QRInno integrates AI, Data Analytics and Robotic to enable “Center of Excellence” team to sustain and commercialize their idea to global products and services.
QRInno provides permanent positions, trainings and investment in Skills, Expertise and Technology Asset to improve design and marketing productivities.  As its name describes, the company values deeply in Quality, Risk management and Innovation - The PORTFOLIO engine to FINANCE everyone’s Growth.
job_requirement: Degree in Computer Science, IT, Computer Engineering or equivalent. Min 3~5 years of working experience in software development. Complete at least 1 full SDLC cycle in a sizable software system development project. Fresh entry candidates with good academic results and passions in software development and new IT technologies will be considered. Ability to lead and deliver complex projects under various environments (Windows, Unix and Linux). Solid background in OOP and knowledge of software design patterns/ best practices and software development process is essential Specialized in developing scalable enterprise and web based applications using Java/J2EE. Good experience in Core Java (1.8), Spring Boot. Experience in Micro Service Architecture style implementation using Spring Boot. Knowledge on build process (Maven/ Gradle), continuous integration (Jenkins/ Team City), code quality analysis. Exposure and knowledge on Linux and Bash shell scripts. Experience of video streaming, video coding technologies and video analytics use case application is a plus. Experience with Agile Scrum development practices is a plus. Strong learning and problem solving skills. Self-motivated individuals with the ability to learn and develop independently with minimum supervision. A team player who possesses good interpersonal, communication skills and ability to work independently and in a team.

job_description: Want to work for a funded startup in Singapore that is building the next generation of artificial analysts for marketers?Our technology turns data into insights and presentation ready reports, at a scale to support some of the largest marketers, agencies and technologies companies across the world.  We are hiring engineers to join our team to build the next generation of Nugit SDKs, services and algorithms that automatically produce presentation ready reports in many different formats from super interactive web views, TV, old school formats such as Email, PowerPoint, and APIs that other applications can use to present Nugit data. This is your chance to work at the absolute forefront of technology and design; using modern frameworks and a microservices architecture deployed on the cloud.  Nugit’s team comes from 15 different countries, and specialises in many different technologies and areas such as Design, Data Engineering, Visualisation, SaaS applications.  Everyone contributes their unique skills and experience to create an awesome environment for learning, challenging yourself and delivering value to the marketing services industry. The Role: Software Engineer In this role you will be joining the API/Service Engineering team primarily focusing on the application service layer. Core Responsibilities  You will work together with the API team to:  Maintain and improve the internal APIs Develop the API to support new front-end features Improve and develop new features for the internal admin interface Implement integrations with 3rd party services Review and turn business requirements into actionable solution implementation Contribute in Kaizen effort in tooling, processes and communication  You are proactive and willing to learn
job_company_info: Nugit is on a mission to help marketers make smarter decisions. We believe that decisions based on data are better. Nugit combines artificial intelligence, natural language generation and beautiful visualizations that transform your data into decision-ready reports which flow straight back into your workflow. Let our technology do the analysis so you can focus on strategy.
job_requirement: Requirements For this role, we are seeking talented individuals who matches below profile:  Experienced Ruby and Ruby on Rails, Postgresql and Rspec Your believe in writing tests You are experienced in working with 3rd party APIs and also perfectly comfortable in building Restful API You are organized and you write documentation You strive at following processes and best practices  General Skills  You are entrepreneurial - you’re an independent thinker and a problem solver You are effective – you use version control with git, you work fast, ship product and you get stuff done You are a team player - you want to work with engineers, designers and data scientists from all over the world You are adaptable - you embrace the fast paced and always changing nature of a startup You are remarkable - you can show us real world examples of the amazing stuff you have built in the past You are curious and a fast learner  NOTE TO APPLICANTS: How to apply & the recruitment processTo make it easier for us to hire you, please summarize why we should hire you at Nugit. Education and work experience are important, but please do not hesitate to tell us about other projects you have worked on. We would love to hear about amazing things you have built in the past.Shortlisted candidates will go through a phone interview and a technical screen within a week from applying. If all goes well we will invite you over to the office to talk with fellow engineers and get a taste of working at Nugit, before we make our final decision. From start to finish, the process will take a few weeks.

job_description: Software Engineer  • Implement applications using Microsoft development tools in N-Tier environment • Provide supports to development projects throughout the project life cycle • Understand technical and functional design requirements • Assist in physical and logical database design • Create prototypes for client engagements • Design, code, and test technical solutions • Identify system deficiencies and recommends solutions • Contribute to functional requirements and translate them into technical design and development projects • Document features, technical specifications, and infrastructure requirements for self-produced technical work and job processes
job_company_info:
As a leading Recruitment consultancy in Singapore with about two decades of experience, Personnel Link JobHub has created a niche for itself in successfully providing manpower services such as Executives searches, Temporary, Permanent and overseas placements to global companies and SMEs.

	Personnel Link JobHub seeks to help organisations yield the maximum benefits on their recruiting investments. This is accomplished with the dedication of a pool of committed recruitment consultants who come from various backgrounds, equipped with their own set of expertise in the respective industries
job_requirement: • Diploma in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or related fields • Minimum 2 years of software engineering experience with a thorough understanding of commercial software product development • Experience in C# and .Net Technologies Salary: Up to S$3200 Location: Tai Seng / Ubi Interested candidate, can email resume to jazmin@personnellink.com.sg and cc to career@personnellink.com.sg

job_description: About the Company Circles.Life is World’s first and most successful digital telco. We have a mission: to re-imagine the mobile experience for the digital consumer through our customer centric mobile platform and disrupt the multi-trillion dollar global telco industry. We launched our services in Singapore in 2016 and have since gained market share quickly while delivering best-in-class customer experience. Currently Circles beats all other telcos on metrics like NPS, subscriber growth, average data used per subscriber and overall customer satisfaction.      Our customers use ~3x the data compared to rest of the market. They are forever online and are digital natives. We are putting together a team that can use this treasure trove of data and develop the most complete understanding of customers that telco industry has ever seen. We have an opening for a Software Engineer who wants to gain valuable experience and exposure at a rapidly scaling telco startup in Singapore. Do you want to get first hand insights on how a rapidly scaling tech startup operate?   Do you enjoy working within an entrepreneurial environment, having personal freedom to act, and be part of a fun, energetic team who are running at full speed to ignite a digital disruption in telecommunications? If the answer is YES, read on to find out more about the role at Circles.Life!
job_company_info: Circles.Life Technology Pte Ltd (CLT) is a subsidiary of Circles.Asia, the holding company of Circles.Life brand. With our game-changing digital products and leading no-contract data focused mobile plans, we're bringing a whole new experience to the digital consumer market. Our mission is to re-imagine the mobile experience for the digital consumer and to disrupt the multi-trillion global telco industry.
job_requirement: Responsibilities As a Software Engineer, you will be responsible for orchestrating data integration from multiple systems, as well as providing and supporting various functionalities to operations and infrastructure. As a part of the backend team you will work towards delivering specific milestones and objectives in a very fast paced environment.                                You will be in charge of the following:                  End to end development (Language used is flexible) Managing cloud based web application on Amazon Web Services Develop restful JSON web services and APIs Integration of external systems using custom soap based third party APIs

job_description: Are you looking for a position that will not only challenge you professionally but also provide a good work/quality of life balance with other talented individuals? Are you interested in working for a fast growing and innovative multicultural organization? Responsibilities Alphanova is looking for a Full Stack Software Engineer. This employee will be a member of the Technical team and will work with various functional groups on gathering requirements, evaluating, designing, implementing, and supporting solutions. We look for individuals who deliver projects on-time and ensure that it meets the business requirements. The candidate must be able to multi-task and work in an evolving environment. This Employee will:  Build RESTful web services/API endpoints to serve the application needs, taking responsibility for the quality of code you produce Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers Build efficient, testable, and reusable modules Implement toolkits and APIs for purposes such as integration, performance optimisation, security and scalability Integration of data storage solutions (such as MySQL, Amazon S3) Build automated tests to support our continuous deployment environment Share knowledge of tools and techniques with your wider team, both developers and non-developers Provide timely updates to the project management on work progress and tasks assigned Able to work in a team with an Agile set up, with minimal supervision An awareness of technologies used for web applications, eg databases, backups, CDNs and search, and of Unix-like operating systems, eg Linux and/or Mac OS experience of working on, or with web technologies

job_description: This role is a part of the team that is responsible for Network configuration and activation of Product and Services to StarHub enterprise customers within agreed Service Level Agreement. There are 2 parts of responsibilities to this role: (1) Provide end-to-end circuit configuration/provision for customers; (2) Participlate in the service design and automation projects when needed.
job_company_info: StarHub is Singapore's fully-integrated info-communications company, offering a full range of information, communications and entertainment services for both consumer and corporate markets. StarHub operates a mobile network that provides 4G, 3G and 2G services. It also manages an islandwide HFC network that delivers multi-channel pay TV services (including HDTV, Internet TV and on-demand services) as well as ultra-high speed residential broadband services. StarHub operates an extensive fixed business network that provides a wide range of data, voice and wholesale services. Over Singapore’s fibre-based Next Generation Nationwide Broadband Network, StarHub offers a broad range of home and business broadband plans along with a host of advanced media-rich value-added services, such as IPTV for commercial entities.      Launched in 2000, StarHub has become one of Singapore's most innovative info-communications providers, and the pioneer in 'hubbing' - the ability to deliver unique integrated and converged services to all its customers. StarHub, listed on the main board of the Singapore Exchange since October 2004, is a component stock of the Straits Times Index and the MSCI Singapore Free Index.
job_requirement: • Design circuit path and configure/provision circuits in live network for customers • Liaise with various departments for service delivery or project work • Work with Field Engineers or Contractors for last mile testing • Ensure services are delivered to customers as per agreed RFS (Request for Service) date • Troubleshoot technical problems pertaining to provisioning fault • Work after office hour or weekends circuit testing and migration work when required • Optimize service delivery via automation work • Work with “off the shelf” software and or open-source software, modifying it and integrating it into the existing network by creating the code to link the systems together • Review current systems as part of continuous service improvement framework • Present and implement ideas for system improvements • Produce detailed specifications and implement automation with team and or vendor • Test product in controlled, real situations before going live • Prepare training manuals for users

job_description: Taiger seeks a Senior NLP Engineer to join our international team. The successful candidate will be a hands-on leader in delivering key client engagements, with experience working with both direct teams and implementation partners. As a Senior NLP Engineer in Taiger you will contribute to the development of innovative products, based on state-of-the-art technologies, and able to make a significant impact in the industry. RESPONSIBILITIES  Design and implement strategies for search engines in natural language. Analyze and implement strategies for data extraction. Build, train and refine NLP models customized for specific clients and scenarios. Perform comprehensive testing and QA on the NLP modules. Provide NLP support for multiple diverse languages. Introduce new techniques, technologies and standards as needed. Provide knowledge about technology and business trends advising about potential benefits and impacts. Contribute to the design and development of our products. Participate in the development and implementation of scalable, robust and fault-tolerant Java EE systems.

job_description: Taiger seeks a NLP Engineer to join our international team. The successful candidate will be a hands-on leader in delivering key client engagements, with experience working with both direct teams and implementation partners. As a NLP Engineer in Taiger you will contribute to the development of innovative products, based on state-of-the-art technologies, and able to make a significant impact in the industry. RESPONSIBILITIES  Design and implement strategies for search engines in natural language. Analyze and implement strategies for data extraction. Build, train and refine NLP models customized for specific clients and scenarios. Perform comprehensive testing and QA on the NLP modules. Provide NLP support for multiple diverse languages. Introduce new techniques, technologies and standards as needed. Provide knowledge about technology and business trends advising about potential benefits and impacts. Contribute to the design and development of our products. Participate in the development and implementation of scalable, robust and fault-tolerant Java EE systems.
job_company_info:
Whilst we waited for flying cars, the 4th industrial revolution began. This will fundamentally change the nature of work at every company. Taiger is leading this transformation and clients that work with us are at the frontier. We deliver revolutionary results by helping clients replace ‘knowledge workers’ with a more reliable, Artificial Intelligence powered virtual workforce within all of their processes. 
Taiger is a global leader in cognitive automation for financial enterprises and other organisations, present on four continents. We build digital machines that are faster, better and cheaper than humans in certain work functions, or make humans vastly more productive in others. These are big, difficult problems which require equally audacious technical solutions. 
Traditional structured data is only a fraction of an organisation’s information; the vast majority of information is unstructured content: documents, reports, emails, survey forms, voice calls etc. Traditional machine learning approaches alone cannot solve for unstructured information. This requires something much more special.
Taiger fundamentally solves unstructured information access problems and transforms mere information into executable knowledge. Our product portfolio is based on a state-of-the-art AI solution architecture for reuse and agile integration.
Taiger has a deep expertise in combining 5 of the 7 forms of AI to help make financial institutions profitable again. This is technically achieved through the application of semantic and natural language processing (NLP) techniques, knowledge representation, perception and concept-extraction and multi-language ontology building skills, which no other product provider offers.
We undertake cutting edge research and apply the latest technical innovations to solve real problems. 
You should genuinely be excited by an unstructured, fast moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you.
job_requirement: REQUIRED  Demonstrated experience with Natural Language technologies and engines (GATE is a plus). Knowledge about NLP processes (Entity Recognition, Parsing) Experience with Data Mining and Text Mining. Familiarity with Semantic Technologies. Experience in Java development. Excellent written and oral communication skills in English. PhD, MSc or BSc in computer science, engineering or a related technical discipline (or equivalent), preferred.  Preferred  Knowledge about OWL, RDF, SPARQL, semantic repositories,… Knowledge about other NLP toolkits (Stanford NLP, UIMA, NLTK,…) Linguistics knowledge for non-English languages, especially Spanish, Portuguese, Asian languages Knowledge on Speech Recognition. Experience with Java EE, Spring and Maven.  To apply, please submit your resume through our jobs link: https://taiger.bamboohr.com/jobs/

job_description: We are looking for exceptional Machine Comprehension Data Scientists to embark on our journey to deploy world class deep learning and machine learning algorithms in the investment and portfolio management space ​ The Data Scientist (Machine Comprehension) should have a PhD or Masters in Computer Science, Statistics, Deep Learning or Machine Learning and a strong background in statistical methods such as Bayesian statistics, time series, and feature engineering. ​ If you have a passion for building state-of-the-art deep learning and machine learning models and have an keen interest in Natural Language Processing and semantic AI, this is your opportunity.
job_company_info:
At Amaris, we create, develop and implement deep learning AI solutions that exceed business needs, with total focus, delivery excellence and unwavering commitment to our customers.
Each day, we strive to create and develop the best AI solutions, using state-of-the-art platforms, models, algorithms and codes. Our team of world class data scientists work closely with our customers to deliver highly effective
AI solutions that best fit organizations.
With our customized solutions, our customers will gain massive competitive advantage. Our dedicated team is committed to help our customers stay ahead of the competition, consistently refreshing the solutions with the latest and even more capable AI technology to stand the test of time. That is our satisfaction and reward.
We learn deep, so you can win big.

job_description: Do you believe your designs and code could change the world?  If YES, read on! Mavericks Consulting is a powerhouse of skilled IT professionals who love their craft. We solve complex business problems by applying agile software development practices and produce simple working solutions.   Mavericks collaborates closely with clients to achieve their business goals.  We provide consultancy advice, develop prototypes to experiment and validate ideas quickly.  We develop robust and reliable operational systems within weeks, not months.  We love to write code and we build systems that put smiles on faces of our delighted users. We believe in sharing our knowledge, upskilling and growing with the developer community. We organise tech related workshops and bootcamps to learn from each other. We share and have fun together in our continuous learning journey. We are looking for like minded Mavericks to join us and multiply the fun and awesomeness at our workplace. To give a brief idea of what we expect from a potential Maverick :   What you will be responsible for:  Genuinely wanting to help to change the world Learning something new everyday, working and pairing with amazing people Write quality code alongside your development team Helping our clients solve challenging and complex problems Creating and maintaining a dynamic and collaborative environment Making the company better with your ideas Being flexible/open to learning new and cool stuff Championing Agile development practices in communities
job_company_info:
We are a group of passionate and creative individuals eager to help you crystallize ideas and turn them into scalable working solutions. We aim to deliver real and measurable business value.
We engineer simple solutions to complex business problems and use Innovative methods backed by an Agile Mindset to deliver valuable strategic solutions for our clients as early as possible. This is coupled with our Design Thinking, Engineering finesse and Continuous Delivery discipline for delivery excellence.
We want to partner and grow with the top businesses and courageous executives and help achieve their vision. We believe in working together as one team building on a strong foundation of trust, respect, openness, shared passion and enthusiasm to help transform your business.

Proactive and able to take up leadership roles in solving problems. Have opinions on tech stack and help business clients make meaningful decisions. Programming languages like Java, Rails, Python, Scala, GoLang; DevOps practices; test automation; infrastructure automation etc. Experience with frameworks like ReactJS

job_description: Opensoft is awesome because our employees make us that way. Our corporate mission is to put our customers first, do the right thing, never stop innovating and ultimately make a difference. We offer a career path that seeks to develop your full potential as you grow together with our company. If you're looking for challenges in your career, it's an opportunity now to become part of our winning team.  We are looking for a software applications developer who has intelligence, creativity, quality, loyalty & technical leadership. job_company_info:
Our focus is to create a better experience for the workforce. At Opensoft, we strive daily to deliver powerful innovative software solutions for our clients and hope to lead the way by championing the things we are passionate about.
We offer HR solutions via our HR application: eOpensoft. eOpensoft is a comprehensive HR management platform that covers a variety of HR operations. This includes: Leave Management, Claims Management, Employee Schedule Management and Time & Attendance.
job_requirement: We have an immediate opening for software engineer to join our development team.  At OpensoftHR, we're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business of HRMS applications. We work hard, and we're serious about what we do. About us   We design, build and deliver OpensoftHR software products for the web and on mobile.   We are a self-contained team including development, testing, deployment and production support.   We collaborate and get things done while having fun.   We practise Scrums.   As a Software Engineer, a typical day might include the following:   Creating software components and frameworks that are inherently testable and easily understood by other developers.   Build and deliver, test, and refine OpensoftHR’s product suite.   Involved in all aspects of product development cycle, from requirements analysis, writing specifications, code development, verification, and iterations for improvements.   Share ideas and listen to your fellow colleagues to select the best approach to design efficient, maintainable, reliable software design and coding.   Tackle a wide variety of challenges throughout the stack and contribute daily to all parts of our product code base.   Manage unit and integration software testing and assist Quality Assurance team providing the guidelines to perform functional testing.   Able to work both in a team and alone and to manage your own workload.   Attend daily Scrums.   Here’s what we’re looking for:   3+ years of industry experience as a software engineer writing code in a production environment.   Working experience in development using Microsoft .NET Framework preferred.   Strong hands on coding, design, and architectural skills.   Research and propose right technologies for new projects.   Experience with web technologies and system design using Visual Studio, ASP.NET, Android, iOS, JavaScript, Angular, HTML, CSS, Jquery, AJAX, C#, Ionic framework.   Solid knowledge and experienced in cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them. job_company_info: Founded in 1902, Air Liquide is the world leader in gases, technologies and services for industry and health. It is present in Singapore since 1911, where the need for a reliable gas producer to support the burgeoning Far East economy led to the establishment of Far East Oxygen Pte Ltd. Later, the rapid industrial growth augmented the need to develop a wider supply chain, giving rise to the formation of Singapore Oxygen Air Liquide (SOXAL). In 2016, the Company's name was renamed to Air Liquide Singapore (ALSg).   From a modest gas production capacity in the 1920s, ALSg today operates in more than 20 locations around Singapore and employs 800 people, making it the largest industrial and medical gas provider in South East Asia. ALSg provides the essential gas infrastructure, equipment and gases to the assortment of industries, including electronics, petrochemicals, chemicals, aviation, marine, biomedical, pharmaceutical, environmental and health care with the same efficiency and reliability that Singapore has become renowned for.

job_description: PLAY A MAJOR LEADERSHIP ROLE BY ORCHESTRATING THE WORK OF PROJECT TEAMS FOCUSED IN DESIGN, DEVELOPMENT, AND DELIVERY OF OUSTANDING SOLUTIONS FOR ALL PHASES ON CLIENT PROJECT. ESTABLISHES OVERALL DESIGN CONCEPTS AND MAINTAINS CONTUNUITY OF THOSE CONCEPTS THROUGH COMPLETION. GUIDES DESIGN TEAM FROM CONCEPT THROUGH SCHEMATIC DESIGN; AND MAINTAINS CONTINUITY OF DESIGN THOURH DESIGN DEVELOPMENT, CONSTRUCTION DOCUMENTS AND CONSTRUCTION ADMINISTRATION. SERVES AS INTERPRETER OF CLIENT AND OPERATOR STANDARDS AND BUDGET INTO DESIGN. TRANSLATES CONCEPTS INTO SCHEMATIC DESIGN CRITERIA. ENSURES THAT THE SCHEMATIC DESIGN IS COMMUNICATED PROPERLY TO CLIENT, DESIGN TEAM AND PRODUCTION TEAM. DEVELOPS WITH THE PROJECT MANAGER AND PRICIPAL IN CHARGE STAFF UTILIZATION/WORK PLAN AND SCHEDULING. CONFER WITH CLIENT TO DETERMINE FACTORS AFFECTING PLANNING INTERIOR ENVIRONMENTS, SUCH AS BUDGETS, ARCHITECTURAL PREFERENCES, AND PURPOSE AND FUNCTION. ADVISE CLIENT ON INTERIOR DESIGN FACTORS SUCH AS SPACE PLANNING, LAYOUT AND UTILIZATION OF FURNISHINGS OR EQUIPMENT, AND COLOR COORDINATION. ULTIMATELY RESPONSIBLE FOR UNDERSTANDING CLIENT PROGRAM, BUDGET AND CRITERIA. DETERMINES LEVEL AND QUALITY OF FINISHES. REVIEW AND DETAILS SHOP DRAWING AND COORDINATE WITH OTHER PROFESSIONALS, SUCH AS PROJECT MANAGERS, ARCHITECTS, ENGINNERS-MACHANICAL, ELECTRICAL, TO  ENSURE JOB SUCCESS. CONSULT WITH FFE TO ENSURE INSTALLATION, AND ARRANGMENT OF CARPETING, FIXTURES, ACCESSORIES, DRAPERIES, PAINT AND WALL COVERINGS, ART WORK, FURNITURE, AND RELATED ITEMS. SELECT OR DESIGN, FURNISHINGS, ART WORKS, AND ACCESSORIES. RENDER DESIGN IDEAS IN FORM OF PASTE-UPS OR DRAWINGS. USE COMPLEX THREE-DIMENSIONAL DESIGN TECHNIQUES, INCLUDING HAND SKETCHES, COMPUTER-AIDED DRAFTING (CAD), ADOBE PHOTO SHOP, REVIT, MISCROSOFT OFFICE AND RELATED SOFTWARE TO PRODUCE CONSTRUCTION DOCUMENTS. STRONG ORGANIZATIONAL, COMMUNICATION AND RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT SKILLS. PARTICIPATED IN DEVELOPMENT OF PRESENTATION MATERIAL AND HELPS MAINTAIN GRAPHIC QUALITY AND CONTENT. PARTICIPATES IN CLIENT PRESENTATIONS/MEETINGS THROUGH DESIGN DEVELOPMENT, THEN AS REQUIRED THROUGH OUT THE DESIGN AND DOCUMENTATION PHASES. COMMUNICATES DESIGN INTENT TO CONSULTANTS AND REVIEWS WORK FOR CONFORMANCE TO DESIGN INTENT. REVIEW COST ESTIMATES WITH PROJECT TEAM.

job_description: About the Company  With a base in more than 180 countries, our Client is a global provider of managed internet and hybrid networks, SD-WAN and Cloud connectivity solutions. Our Client’s XDN portfolio provides Internet Connectivity, Cloud Acceleration and network optimisation, SD-WAN, network security managed services, and Xpertise – managed professional and field services for network solutions. Starting as a pioneer in 2004 in Europe, our Client has created a unique global offering, and today operates in all key regions and has offices in the Netherlands, United States, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, Argentina, Russia, Mexico and Morocco. Responsibilities As a Sales Support Representative you will assist the sales team to achieve their targets. You will work on the administration side of the business which includes handling correspondence, reviewing opportunities and creating as well as distributing quotations. The Sales Support Representative is a member of the Singapore based sales support team and reports to the Sales Support Manager.  Participate and conduct various general administrative tasks using Back Office Systems; Pre-qualify sales requests as delegated by Account Managers; Create and submit quotations to Account Managers or customers in timely manner; Submit availability check requests and process orders; Manage the correspondence between Account Managers and customers; Answer sales queries including phone and email communications; Provide data and reports to support the Sales Team; Follow up on any issues raised during quoting and provisioning phases; Ensure customer requirements are well distributed and understood among departments; Work together with Sales Project Manager in pre/post-sales planning, including but not limited to project rollout planning, creating, following up, and reviewing budgetary and firm quotation before submitting to the Account Managers; Keep Sales information on the Back Office System clean and updated.

job_company_info: Liquid Group is a payments technology company. We operate an open and intelligent payments and consumer engagement platform that delivers integrated and personalised mobile experiences. We provide merchants with tools to drive customer acquisition and improve their marketing efficiency. Through our intelligent analytics and campaign management tools, our merchant partners are able to understand and influence their customers’ purchasing behaviours, providing an improved customer experience and driving meaningful and sustainable business growth. Liquid Group was founded to transform the future of payments. We are a subsidiary of Korvac Holdings Pte Ltd., an investment holding and management company specialising in payments technology. job_description: Summary: The Assistant Project Manager assists in the planning and implementation as a member of a project team to accomplish the objectives of various projects within Advanced Campaign Management Platform Group. With the help of Product and Project Managers, the Assistant Project Manager makes sure that the assigned projects are moving forward according to its plans by working closely with project members and stakeholders. Projects include product improvements and implementations related to CPD (Cost per Duration) ads management for Japan and other global markets. Your primary responsibility is to ensure interim milestones are met for on-time deliveries via effective team communication.    Responsibilities:  Apply project management principles and best practices to manage CPD ads management related projects Manage the full project lifecycle (scope, requirements, schedule, development, delivery) with the assistance from Project Owners Facilitate meetings including scheduling, setting the agenda, facilitating discussion, recapping meeting notes and following up on action items Own the issue list and risk list, keep the lists updated to make sure items are being followed up. job_company_info:
About Rakuten Asia Pte. Ltd. 
Rakuten Asia, Regional Head Office of Asia, comprising of various business verticals such as Rakuten Ventures, Rakuten Marketing; Rakuten Rewards; Asia Tech Development Unit; Rakuten Institute of Technology and Global Marketing Office. 
Our new office, Crimson House Singapore, is located at CapitaGreen which houses Rakuten sister companies including Rakuten Travel; VIKI, Ebates, Viber & AIP.
About Rakuten Japan 
Rakuten is Japan’s leading Internet services company, largest e-commerce company in Japan, and third largest e-commerce marketplace worldwide with a combined membership of 1 billion. Rakuten have 70+ businesses and services spread across 29 countries and regions worldwide. 
Our global footprint starts from Japan to Asia, the Americas and Europe with a wide portfolio of services. Rakuten is an Eco-system of online services, providing a variety of consumer and business-focused services including e-commerce, e-reading, travel, banking, securities, credit card, e-money, portal and media, online marketing and professional sports.
For more information on Rakuten and its business, please visit http://global.rakuten.com/corp/

job_description: PROJECT PERMIT –TO-WORK (PTW) COORDINATOR JOB DESCRIPTIONS The PTW Coordinator acts as the focal point to consolidate and track all permit to work requests. He will assist the Construction Manager, Project Manager, Safety Manager to ensure that there are no conflicting activities for the PTWs applied. The Project PTW Coordinator shall:  Apply various permits to work systems in the project Receive Permit to Work from various construction verifying supervisors. Record the permits in a register, specifying the work scope, location, requestor, date and schedule of work, permit issuance, permit status, time of permit closure etc. Review the permits to confirm that all documents are submitted by the Verifying Supervisors. Screen the permits to identify conflicting activities and perform initial screening of compliance with the Permit Applicants for any conflicting permits. Present the Register of Permit Application in the Daily Project Coordinator in the Daily  Coordination Meeting so that the Project Manager and Construction Manager decide on which permits get approved and which are not issued. Record the issuance and closing on the Register of Permits. Ensure and physically check on all PTW movements with the permit number. PTW will liaise with the supervisors on workplace.

job_description: We are seeking a Senior Project Manager to join our team in Malaysia who will be responsible to lead the execution of medium-size projects. As a project manager at ABB, you will get to tackle some of the most innovative and complex engineering projects being implemented today, such as EPC / turnkey solutions that combine our strengths in both power and automation technologies. The position will provide overall management and leadership for implementation of strategic power generation projects in Asia Pacific region and support pre-sales activities. You will be required to deliver multiple projects of high complexity and ensure projects are executed safely, within budget, with high quality to meet project schedules. Reporting to the Head of Project Management, your key areas of responsibility will include, but are not limited to: • Define guidelines, allocate project tasks and lead the project team allocated to the project and monitor the resources to accomplish all tasks • Plan project documents including scope and financial plans, schedule and risk management • Monitor and control project financials, oversee project invoicing status, cost, expenses and cash flow. • Identify, quantify and manage project risks and ensure all opportunities are pursued • Ensure that the project applies contract claims management, coordinate with supply chain management and procure required services, materials and equipment for the project • Act as key contact for the customer, build and maintain strong relationship with internal and external stakeholders
job_company_info: ABB is one of the world’s leading power and automation companies. We provide energy-efficiency and productivity solutions to industrial and utility customers and our technologies can be found across the globe.  In Singapore, ABB employs 1200 people across 4 locations island-wide.  Since 1971, it has been contributing to Singapore’s development and growth with leading-edge innovations that contribute to a more sustainable future.        ABB Singapore was conferred regional business headquarter status by the EDB in November 2000 and had invested in an industrial automation centre at its Ayer Rajah facility to grow its portfolio and better serve its growing customer base.
job_requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Engineering (Electrical/Instrumentation and Control) • 15 to 20 years of experience in project management of which at least 10 years of experience in handling international project • Experience of handling offshore and onshore power generation projects of high complexity • Experience of electrical engineering, control system solutions for power generation plants • Project Management certification is preferred

job_description: The Project Manager leads project teams within SERIS, oversees project progress through all phases of the project and liaises with industry clients to understand their needs and requirements. The Project Manager's role is key to fostering great client relations and developing our employees.  This position is responsible for project planning, project management, client negotiations, risk management, cost estimation, contract management and execution strategy. Essential duties and responsibilities include the following (other duties may be assigned):  Manage key industry projects and oversees project progress. Develop project timelines, and manage people and materials to complete jobs on schedule and within budget guidelines. Responsible for liaison activities with clients, operating as the lead point of contact for project customers. Liaise between customers and cross-functional internal teams, ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and improve the entire customer experience. Ideal candidate is able to identify customer needs and exceed client expectations. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships, actively developing relations to generate opportunities for new industry contracts. Contract negotiation and management. Support project development in pre-contract efforts including review and collaboration on estimates, schedules, and contracts. Assist the business development manager in developing strategic plans for outreach, new business development, new opportunities, industry/research collaborations, etc. Forecast and keep track of industry incomes (e.g. quarterly results and annual forecasts)

job_company_info:
DDG is an Human Resource consulting firm specialising in delivering innovative HR technology based solutions to our clients.
 
DDG is also the leading sales and implementation partner in Asia Pacific for SuccessFactors, an SAP company.
 
With over 7 years experience in implementing SuccessFactors systems across a range of industries for companies from 200 employees to large corporate organisations engaging over 500,000 employees and working on some of the largest implementations in the APAC region.
 
DDG has years of experience with SAP's Core HRIS, SuccessFactors Employee Central, as well as all the Talent modules including PM/GM, Succession & CDP, Recruitment Management and Marketing, On-Boarding, Compensation, Learning Management & SuccessFactors Workforce Planning and Analytics.
 
DDG has over 15+ years of experience in Human Resource Management
job_requirement: Minimum 5 years of deep hands-on functional experience in the implementation and configuration for IT implementation projects; cross-modules / applications integration experience Vast experience on challenging implementations experiences for clients Ability to analyse business processes, complete complex business design for gap / interfaces and configure system to user requirements Excellent communication skills Excellent project management skills  What else do you need to know?  This is a challenging, exciting and fast paced environment The DDG consulting team is the fastest growing team in DDG; you would support a volume of exciting engagements. The role requires creativity, strong technical ability, interpersonal skills, innovative mindset, attention to detail and be well organised. There is an excellent work-life balance on the team and a warm, welcoming culture. The DDG team works closely and cohesively. We encourage a very supportive yet efficient work environment to continue improving the way we implement SaaS in years to come. We like people with a sense of humour who can bring a sense of perspective in those stressful moments. People who can work independently but effectively in a non-traditional corporate environment will excel in DDG.  In addition, the following will also be essential:  Will successfully combine strong leadership skills with sound technical knowledge and ability to clearly communicate key recommendations to clients. Track record of creating enduring client relationships based on trust, successful business development and credible programme execution Has developed relationships of mutual trust with people inside and outside of their organisation based on respect, integrity, positive regard and an appreciation of the uniqueness of the individual  Excellent Benefits  Market competitive salary (Basic salary, bonus) Medical benefit Regional travel

job_description: Your Responsibilities:  This role has accountability for the project management of the successful delivery and deployment of the multiple market waves, as they transition to the new operating model – managing schedule/ plans, scope, resources and cost for each of the transitions Accountability for successfully deploying the operating model for the markets/teams in scope without disruption to GSK operations  Ensuring that all activities and objectives are completed to schedule and quality to ensure effective business readiness for adopting the new model; this includes new processes, accountabilities and ways of working During deployment the role is dedicated to driving the delivery and following the project management methodologies. Location is flexible within APAC.   This is a newly created 1 year contractual role under GSK.  Responsibilities Undertake end-to-end accountability for the project management for the Waves in scope – managing the schedule / plans; scope, resources, risks, issues and critical success factors  Accountable for delivery of individual Wave scope and plans - managing these to completion in the agreed plan to agreed quality standards Responsible for managing timely and quality deliverables/outputs from the relevant phases including: Pre Due Diligence, Due Diligence, Knowledge Transfer planning, Knowledge Transfer, Go live, Stabilisation and Adoption/Embedding and any other team delivering to the Wave plan Liaise with the Solution Lead and Design Authority to prioritise the business-critical requirements Work with Regional Transformation Program Manager, Global PMO and Solution Leads to confirm and manage the scope and budget for the Wave, and ensure timely approvals of the phase outputs  Define and agree detailed deployment plans with FDs Manage and monitor the Wave deployment performance, progress against milestones, and appropriateness and quality of work, and where necessary, take corrective action Manage and work with Change Management, Communications and HR to effectively support the markets in getting ready for adoption and embedding of the business change for the market/teams.  What We Can Offer You GSK’s dedication to the wellbeing of our employees is reflected in the benefits we offer; including healthcare for yourself and dependents, performance related bonus, long term incentives and a host of other flexible offerings you can tailor to your own preferences. We also offer a range of employee health and wellbeing programs including our truly unique Partnership for Prevention program, a global commitment by GSK to provide all employees with up to 40 preventative healthcare services bringing to life our mission to: do more, feel better and live longer.  Application Process At GSK we value diversity and treat all candidates equally. We aim to create an inclusive workplace where all employees feel engaged, supportive of one another, and know their work makes an important contribution. If you would like to join us in innovating and inspiring changes in the industry, we urge you to apply.
job_company_info:
ABOUT US
GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) is one of the world's leading research-based pharmaceutical and healthcare companies. Headquartered in the UK, we employ more than 97,300 people in over 115 countries.
GSK brings vaccines and innovative medicines to patients in Singapore to help prevent and treat diseases including allergy, asthma, cancer, dermatology and infectious diseases. Over-the-counter medicines, oral and denture care products, wellness products as well as nutritional health drinks are provided for millions in the country by GSK Consumer Healthcare. In addition to our pharmaceutical and consumer healthcare operations, Singapore also houses our Emerging Markets and Asia Pacific Headquarters, R&D Headquarters, Research Centre, two Global Manufacturing and Supply (GMS) sites, and a new Vaccine plant. To date, GSK's total investment in Singapore exceeds S$1.5 billion.
 
Global Manufacturing and Supply (GMS)
GMS has two primary Global Manufacturing and Supply sites located in Quality Road (QR) and Pioneer Sector (Jurong) supplying 18 Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs) for the treatment of respiratory, oncology, gastro-intestinal, allergy, anti-viral, HIV and neurological conditions for the global markets. Together, both sites host five world-class production facilities. The 5-hectare QR site with two production facilities hosts one of the world’s largest Amoxicillin facilities and is the primary source of Amoxicillin within GSK; the 9-hectare Jurong site boasts three multi-purpose production buildings and a 2-stream R&D Pilot Plant.
GSK Vaccines (Tuas)
GSK Vaccines, the vaccine division of GlaxoSmithKline (GSK), is one of the world's leading vaccine manufacturers, supplying around 26% of the world's vaccines. Headquartered in Belgium, GSK Vaccines employs more than 12,200 people and has approximately thirty marketed vaccines.
Stiefel Laboratories
In July 2009, GSK acquired Stiefel Laboratories to create a new world-leading specialist dermatology business. It was a significant step forward to diversify our business and provide immediate new growth opportunities.
GSK - R&D
Opened in 2005, GSK’s Singapore Research Centre was GSK’s first pre-clinical R&D facility in Asia Pacific and is located in Biopolis, at the centre of Singapore’s biomedical sciences business park. Our research centre is the home of the Neural Pathways Discovery Performance Unit (NPDPU). Comprising approximately 50 scientists with expertise ranging from Biology and Drug Metabolism & Pharmacokinetics through to Medicinal Chemistry, the NPDPU is responsible for advancing innovative early stage drug discovery programmes through to clinical proof of concept in patients.
 
As a science-led, global healthcare business with clear values, we offer countless opportunities for people at various stages of their careers. On-the-job learning and rewarding individual contributions are extremely important to us. We believe in creating an inclusive and safe working environment and supporting our employees to help their communities. To find out more: http://www.gsk.com/careers/why-gsk.html
job_requirement: Basic qualifications:  Degree holder with knowledge and experience of following project management methodologies Experienced in Business/Commercial transformation projects Preferred qualifications:  Evidence of successful project delivery across multiple countries and businesses Confidence and acumen to build strong relationships with the FDs Why GSK?:  At GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) we are dedicated to improving the quality of human life by enabling people to do more, feel better, live longer. GSK is one of the world’s leading research based healthcare companies, with over 100,000 employees in 150 countries across our Pharmaceuticals, Vaccines and Consumer Healthcare business.  We are proud of the difference we make and in 2016, FORTUNE Magazine ranked GSK #1 on its list of companies that are changing the world. The 'Change the World' list recognises companies that have made significant progress in sustainable, scalable approaches to addressing societal problems as part of their company strategy. Put simply, our focus is on improving access and affordability of medicines, regardless of where people live or their ability to pay.  GSK has been present in Asia for over 50 years and our commitment to the region is strengthened by the establishment of our purpose-built headquarters for Asia. Situated in Singapore, GSK Asia House is a further step in our long-standing strategy to grow and diversify our company - emphasizing the globally balanced business we have built over the years. To better support Asia, we focus on developing talent to improve our ability to make the right decisions for healthcare professionals, patients and consumers across the region.

job_description: CCRO, as an independent, global function, is mandated with the management of all Compliance and Regulatory matters for the bank in all regions and across all businesses. The function monitors bank activities on all levels in order to minimize risks to the bank’s reputation and avoid violation of policies, laws or regulations across all areas of operation. It also ensures transparency of all regulatory interactions of the bank and assesses potential impact and implementation of regulatory developments. The functional strategy is to serve as a proactive, yet independent partner to the business and continuously challenge and support client facing employees and businesses operations to effectively manage their compliance and regulatory risks.   The CCRO APAC Transformation team works closely with stakeholders in the Front Office, Operations (Middle Office), Technology, and Financial Crime Compliance to design and execute across multiple re-engineering and transformation workstreams in an ever-evolving industry landscape.  You will be responsible for supporting project managers in interactions with regional and global business stakeholders to define the target state and expected user value, collaborate with designers on the solution fitting the design target, and accompany the IT development team throughout the development iterations.  Such workstreams will cross business and technology boundaries, focusing on efficiencies in the Bank’s business processes, infrastructure, and information systems.

job_description: Working with the new Liner Operations organisation being a part of the global Operations team with new, exciting possi-bilities for personal and professional development. You can be assured of a positive and diverse work environment where new ideas are always welcome!  Within our own and the larger Liner Operations team, you will enjoy support from colleagues and management who pos-sess extensive experience in sourcing, cost management and liner business. In terms of personal development, this posi-tion polishes your ability to deliver results through internal and external stakeholders, which in this case are several and complex. Networking and interaction with Centre Terminals and Centre Network Design and local/regional/global ven-dors.   KEY RESPONSIBILITIES • Support procurement projects across a wide range of procurement areas. • Provides guidance and expertise for procurement team and acts as a stand-in for more complex cases. • Provides support on procurement projects and drives smaller initiatives within each and every sourcing step • Has accountability for problem solving, analytical work support, and driving insights from analytical work related to procurement functions • Initiates and drives complex projects to expand service area, implement new tools or cultivate new concepts. • Cooperating closely with colleagues and stakeholders in LOC, and within Maersk Line with Country clusters, Cen-tre Terminals, Network Design, Trade & Marketing, and other LOCs. • Perform supplier market analysis and organise market intelligence. • Drive Regional Procurement Initiatives.
job_company_info:
Maersk Line is the world's largest container shipping company, serving customers all across the globe. Maersk Line has 25,000 employees across 325 offices in more than 125 countries. As a leading provider of container shipping services, Maersk Line’s mission is to provide opportunities in global commerce. Maersk Line helps customers source goods from anywhere in the world, creating efficiencies in their supply chains, and making it possible for commodities to reach new markets more quickly. Maersk Line sets the standards in ensuring continuous and consistent reliable and quality service to its customers and is regarded amongst the most reliable carriers in the world.

	The Maersk Group comprises A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S and subsidiaries based in Copenhagen, Denmark. The Group employs about 89,000 people in around 135 countries across the world.

job_company_info:
Active Fire, established since 2001, is a leading total solutions provider for planning, designing and implementing turnkey fire protection systems.
Transforming expertise into work excellence
We take pride in the ability to imprint our knowledge and expertise throughout the entire life-cycle of a fire protection system implementation: from planning and design, to installation, validation, and service and maintenance.
We manage all necessary aspects, providing a complete, one-stop solution that gives customers minimal hassle and peace of mind.
Fire protection is crucial to safeguarding assets and lives, and we uphold ourselves to the most stringent of expectations, complying not just with local laws and regulations, but also with the exacting requirements of American insurance companies and international code of practices.
Certification
In our work, safety and compliance is of paramount importance, and we spare no effort in ensuring that we perform up to and surpassing the expectations and acknowledgement of industrial certification and accreditation.
Customers can feel secure knowing that our work is in full compliance with WSH laws and industry best practices.

ISO 9001 : 2008 UKAS Certification
ISO 9001 : 2008 SAC Accreditation
OHSAS 18001:2007 QEC Certification
bizSAFE Level Star Certification
BCA Contractors Registration, ME06 - Fire Prevention & Protection System, L5, Financial Grade.
Total Defence Awards
Building Control Authority, Singapore Approved Training and Test Centre (ATTC)
Ministry of Manpower (MOM) Dormitory Award 2017 Winner

job_description: Description: Senior Database Specialist  Senior Database Specialist Job Purpose:  As Senior Database Specialist, you will be working closely across mostly two departments: Engineering and Business Intelligence to provide data support and taking the lead in maintaining and optimizing StreetSine’s Database Infrastructure. You will be the pioneer of this specialized department to which you will lead and mentor future database developers.   Senior Database Specialist Job Duties:  Responsible for the stability and optimization of StreetSine’s Database System. Responsible for reviewing and approving incoming Database request sent by Software Engineers. Responsible for security and backup of StreetSine’s Database System. Responsible for providing datasets and other information for Business Analysts. Responsible for understanding the domain knowledge of real estate working closely with Business Intelligence department. Responsible of the understanding of the use and purpose of database tables amongst the Engineering department.   Collaborates and adds value through participation in concept reviews, providing comments and suggestions Is expected to proactively suggest and propose good and sensible solutions and to provide consultancy and advice, not just take down requirements as-is.   Works collaboratively and professionally with other StreetSine associates in cross functional teams to achieve goals Use analytical tools to assess and improve the adoption of a product using our system’s data.   Apply a sense of urgency, commitment and focus on the right priorities in developing solutions in a timely fashion.   Must be willing to take up new challenges.   Expected to work closely with the project manager, development team and business intelligence team to deliver solutions on time. Expected to work closely with Customer Service/Sales team to resolve clients issues regarding data in a timely manner Apply StreetSine’s Mission Statement and Quality Policy and enthusiastically exhibit a desire to see StreetSine succeed   Perform other duties as necessary
